Late 2007 and still 99.9%. Of couse, it's only one file that's incomplete so we can enjoy all of the mp3s in there except Stepner/Kirkpatrick's reading of the 2nd violin sonata, track 2 In The Barn and there's even an alternative and complete reading of that elsewhere in the torrent (Ross and Zimdars' version). I'm only slightly miffed that there's a track that's incomplete....several of the items in here are different recordings to the ones in my collection. 
Incidentally, IMHO this is a better Ives site (than charlesives.org) : http://www.musicweb-international.com/Ives/
Thank you very much for the share.
This is a great collection--but does anyone have the Concord Sonata?  I can't find that anywhere, on any site.
